item.title: 5 DevOps Mistakes that Can Crush ISV Startups
item.description:
Industry experts will tell you the best way to evolve your startup ISV into an established ISV is with DevOps — and they’re probably right. DevOps, however, which has only been in the mainstream for a little less than a decade, can be a difficult concept to master, and many software developers—especially startups—are still navigating […]
